    • Method Detail

      • setComplaintTimer

        void setComplaintTimer(Complaint c)

        Function to check if 24 hours passed since customer service worker entered the complaint. if the time passed, the function changes the value of isAnswered24Hours to false.

        Parameters:
        c - - complaint object for setting timer

      • getNotTreatedComplaintsAnd24NotPassed

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> getNotTreatedComplaintsAnd24NotPassed()
                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception

        Function sends query about all not treated complaints from DB

        Returns:
        generic object arrayList, eventually will be arrayList of complaints
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • handleGet

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> handleGet(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> obj)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception

        A function that get objects from the DB and calls parse. after parse it pushes the data back as a report

        Parameters:
        obj - - an array list of objects the represent row in complaint table in DB.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Objects with all the information that related to the asking report
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This function uses parse that can throw an exception

      • getComplaintsByStore

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> getComplaintsByStore(Store store,
                                                           java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                           java.time.LocalDate endDate)
                                                    throws java.lang.Exception

        Function sends query to get all complaints by specific store

        Parameters:
        obj - - generic object that identify the specific store
        Returns:
        - generic object arrayList, eventually turn to arrayList of complaints
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Context.clientConsole.handleMessageFromClientUI throws IOException.

      • parse

        Complaint parse(java.math.BigInteger complaintID,
                java.math.BigInteger customerID,
                java.math.BigInteger storeID,
                java.lang.String complaintReason,
                java.sql.Timestamp date,
                boolean isTreated,
                boolean isRefunded,
                boolean isAnswered24Hours,
                java.math.BigInteger cswID)
         throws java.lang.Exception

        The function will get data of complaint object from server and fill the fields of it.

        Parameters:
        complaintID - - parameter for complaintID field in object
        customerID - - parameter for customerID field in object
        storeID - - parameter for storeID field in object
        complaintReason - - parameter for complaintReason field in object
        date - - parameter for date field in object
        isTreated - - parameter for isTreated field in object
        isRefunded - - parameter for isRefunded field in object
        isAnswered24Hours - - parameter for isAnswered24Hours field in object
        cswID - - parameter for cswID field in object
        Returns:
        new complaint object filled with data from DB
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
